shipIcon.name: icon_auto
shipIcon.tooltip: HIGH AUTOMATION: This enemy is automated, meaning it cannot be crew-killed. All systems act as though they are manned, and repairs will be made automatically. Breaches will prevent repairs in the affected room.

shipIcon.name: icon_auto_fed
shipIcon.tooltip: MINOR AUTOMATION: This enemy is automated, meaning it cannot be crew-killed. Its piloting system acts as though it is manned, and repairs will be made automatically. Breaches will prevent repairs in the affected room.

shipIcon.name: icon_auto_boss
shipIcon.tooltip: AUTO OVERRIDE: This enemy is also protected by an automated mode that will take over if all of the crew are dead. If auto-mode activates, the ship will gain all benefits that Auto-ships receive. It is impossible to neutralize this vessel via crew kill.

shipIcon.name: icon_auto_storyteller
shipIcon.tooltip: AUTOMATED (SPECIAL): This enemy is automated, but still relies on its crew to run. Systems act as though they are manned, and repairs will be made automatically. Breaches will prevent repairs in the affected room. However, the ship can still be crew killed.

shipIcon.name: icon_threat
shipIcon.tooltip: HIGH LEVEL THREAT: This enemy might pose a major threat to an unprepared vessel. Think carefully if this is an enemy you want to face, and keep your engines ready to run if things go south.

shipIcon.name: icon_majorthreat
shipIcon.tooltip: MAJOR LEVEL THREAT: This ship poses a significant and likely fatal threat to your ship and crew. Avoid conflict with this enemy at all costs.

shipIcon.name: icon_bigmeanie
shipIcon.tooltip: BAD MAN: THIS IS BIG MEANIE!!! Dylan no LIKE BIG MEANIE! KILL. KILL KILL KILL KILL! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA FASDASHFH

shipIcon.name: icon_lowthreat
shipIcon.tooltip: LOW LEVEL THREAT: This enemy poses very little threat to your vessel. Feel free to disregard any threats made by the captain of this sorry ship.

shipIcon.name: icon_specialwep
shipIcon.tooltip: SPECIAL WEAPON: This enemy is carrying a special custom-built weapon or drone. Destroying the vessel only has a 50% chance to drop the item, but killing the crew will guarantee it drops.

shipIcon.name: icon_specialwep_chaos
shipIcon.tooltip: CHAOTIC WEAPON: This enemy is carrying a special custom-built weapon or drone. Destroying the vessel only has a 50% chance to drop the item, but killing the crew will guarantee it drops.

shipIcon.name: icon_surge
shipIcon.tooltip: POWER SURGE: This enemy has one or more power surges that it will activate periodically throughout the fight. Nothing can stop these from occuring except the defeat of your opponent, so try and kill the enemy quickly before things get out of hand!

shipIcon.name: icon_station
shipIcon.tooltip: STATION: This enemy is a station, meaning it has zero evasion without cloaking.

shipIcon.name: icon_resist
shipIcon.tooltip: RESISTANT ROOMS: This enemy has one or more resistant rooms, marked by the grey border and R icon in the top left. Resistant rooms will take no system damage from weapons, but can be damaged by crew and fires. Resistant rooms will take ion and hull damage as normal.

shipIcon.name: icon_ionresist
shipIcon.tooltip: CHARGED RESISTANT ROOMS: This enemy has one or more charged resistant rooms, marked by the teal border and R icon in the top left. Charged Resistant rooms will take no system or ion damage from weapons, but can be damaged by crew and fires. Resistant rooms will take hull damage as normal.

shipIcon.name: icon_no2
shipIcon.tooltip: DEPRESSURIZED: This enemy is depressurized, meaning it has no Oxygen system. Oxygen restoring crew such as Orchids will provide reduced oxygen on this ship. Boarding with aerobic crew is not advised without proper precautions.

shipIcon.name: icon_chaos
shipIcon.tooltip: CHAOTIC: This ship's rooms are protected by some kind of mysterious energy. All non-Siren crew onboard this ship will be overcome by madness, blocking the use of their active abilities. Once they return to your ship, they will go back to normal.

shipIcon.name: icon_invasion
shipIcon.tooltip: INVASION TACTICS: This enemy uses special boarding tactics. Rather than teleporting back crew at low health, it will prioritize sending in more crew instead.

shipIcon.name: icon_math
shipIcon.tooltip: EDUTAINMENT: The malfunctioning Auto is programmed to periodically ask you mathematical questions. Getting these questions wrong could lead to dangerous results, so be careful!

shipIcon.name: icon_preignite
shipIcon.tooltip: PRE-IGNITER: This enemy's weapons will be fully charged at the start of combat.

shipIcon.name: icon_cloakjam
shipIcon.tooltip: TRACKING FLARES: This enemy will disable your cloaking system at the start of combat.

shipIcon.name: icon_shieldboost
shipIcon.tooltip: SHIELD BOOSTER: This enemy's shields recharge 17% quicker.

shipIcon.name: icon_engineboost
shipIcon.tooltip: ENGINE BOOSTER: This enemy's FTL drive charge up 30% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_weaponboost
shipIcon.tooltip: AUTO RELOADER: This enemy's weapons charge 10% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_recontele
shipIcon.tooltip: RECONSTRUCTIVE TELEPORTER: This enemy's crew heal to full every time they teleport.

shipIcon.name: icon_respirators
shipIcon.tooltip: RESPIRATORS: This enemy's crew suffocate at half speed.

shipIcon.name: icon_extinguishers
shipIcon.tooltip: EXTINGUISHERS: Fires aboard this enemy will be automatically extinguished even in the absence of crew.

shipIcon.name: icon_sealant
shipIcon.tooltip: BREACH SEALANT: Breaches on this enemy will automatically be repaired even in the absence of crew.

shipIcon.name: icon_ionarmor
shipIcon.tooltip: ION FIELD: This enemy has a 50% chance to resist all ion damage.

shipIcon.name: icon_backupdna
shipIcon.tooltip: BACKUP DNA: This enemy's crew will be kept alive in the Clone Bay even if it is destroyed or hacked.

shipIcon.name: icon_burrows
shipIcon.tooltip: BURROWS: Enemy Leeches move 50% faster and ignore doors.

shipIcon.name: icon_no2_respirators
shipIcon.tooltip: NO SUFFOCATION: This enemy is not only depressurized, but its own crew will not suffocate while aboard their own ship. They will still suffocate (if applicable) aboard your ship.

shipIcon.name: icon_reality
shipIcon.tooltip: REALITY MANIPULATOR: Random hazards will periodically spawn throughout this fight. These can be stars, asteroid fields, pulsars, or ion storms.

shipIcon.name: icon_cursor
shipIcon.tooltip:
CAT AND MOUSE: Chaotic cursors will periodically appear and disable your ship's systems throughout this fight. Clicking on them will temporarily banish them from your screen.
Oh, and? I wouldn't count on that little "pause" of yours. You might find you have some trouble with your precious crew if you try to cheat me! / :)

shipIcon.name: icon_safetybelt
shipIcon.tooltip: LIFEJACKETS: When any enemy crew are below half health, they will gain doubled movement, healing, and door breaking speed, as well as halved hazard damage.

shipIcon.name: icon_nanomedbay
shipIcon.tooltip: MED-BOTS: This enemy's crew will passively heal anywhere on their ship so long as their Medbay is powered, at 25% speed of the current Medbay power level.

shipIcon.name: icon_droneboost
shipIcon.tooltip: DRONE BOOSTER: This enemy's crew drones are granted +40% movement speed, +25% combat/sabotage damage and repair/extinguishing speed, and +15% to crew healing.

shipIcon.name: icon_scrambler
shipIcon.tooltip: DEFENSE SCRAMBLER: This enemy will jam your Defense Drones, making them incapable of firing. This is only active so long as the enemy Hacking system is functional or present - destroy it for your drones to return to normal.

shipIcon.name: icon_casing
shipIcon.tooltip: TITANIUM SYSTEM CASING: Your crew will sabotage this enemy's systems 60% slower. These systems also have a 15% chance to resist direct damage.

shipIcon.name: icon_grid
shipIcon.tooltip: EMANCIPATION GRID: This enemy's systems are extra-protected from Ghost erosion, reducing their sabotage damage by 20%. If a Door Control system is present and functional, all crew and drones (including anaerobic crew) will lose 4hp/s with an extra 1hp for each level of Door Control above 1.

shipIcon.name: icon_pheromones
shipIcon.tooltip: PHEROMONES: This enemy ship is filled with pheromones. For each active power bar in Life Support, their crew get a bonus 25% movement speed and 6.25% maximum health.

shipIcon.name: icon_freepheromones
shipIcon.tooltip: SYNTHETIC PHEROMONES: This enemy ship is filled with unstable pheromones. For each active power bar in Life Support, their crew get a bonus 15% combat damage. Each level above 1 reduces repair speed by 25%.

shipIcon.name: icon_suzpheromones
shipIcon.tooltip: SUZERAIN PHEROMONES: This enemy ship is filled with superior pheromones. For each active power bar in Life Support, their crew get a bonus 33% movement speed and 15% reduced ability cooldowns.

shipIcon.name: icon_bypass
shipIcon.tooltip: ENERGY BYPASS: This enemy can teleport both crew and bombs, as well as mind control, through Energy Shields. Its ordinary projectiles will still be unable to penetrate through.

shipIcon.name: icon_zoltan_shield
shipIcon.tooltip: ENERGY SHIELD: This enemy is protected by an Energy Shield. Hacking, Mind Control, Teleportation, Boarding Drones, and all hull-damaging or ion weapons will all be blocked until disabled.

shipIcon.name: icon_aether_shield
shipIcon.tooltip: AETHER SHIELD: This enemy is protected by a stronger than usual Energy Shield. In addition to the usual Super Shield benefits, shields also recharge 20% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_ascended_shield
shipIcon.tooltip: ASCENDED SHIELD: This enemy is protected by a sophisticated and resilient Energy Shield. In addition to the usual Super Shield benefits, shields also recharge 45% faster.

shipIcon.name: icon_greenhouse
shipIcon.tooltip: KERNEL GREENHOUSE: This enemy possesses an on-board greenhouse, which gives it a 65% chance to not use ammunition when firing its weapons.

shipIcon.name: icon_spores
shipIcon.tooltip: SPORE DISPENSARY: This enemy pollutes its air with rejuvenating spores, which gives its crew 10% more health and 20% more movement speed aboard their ship. If a Medbay is present, they also regain 1hp/s.

shipIcon.name: icon_shell_gas
shipIcon.tooltip: TOXIC GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time for 6hp/s. Drones, Shells, Vampweeds, Ghosts and Lanius are immune.

shipIcon.name: icon_shell_gas_heal
shipIcon.tooltip: EXPEDITIVE GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time for 3hp/s. While the enemy Medbay is powered, their crew will heal at 90% speed of level 1 Medbay outside of it. Drones, Shells, Vampweeds, Ghosts and Lanius are immune to the damaging properties of the gas.

shipIcon.name: icon_shell_gas_repair
shipIcon.tooltip: NANITE GAS: This enemy ship is filled with a deadly neurotoxin which will passively damage your crew over time for 3hp/s. Actively puts out fires and repairs breaches on the enemy ship. Drones, Shells, Vampweeds, Ghosts and Lanius are immune to the damaging properties of the gas.

shipIcon.name: icon_hackstun
shipIcon.tooltip: NEURAL DISRUPTOR: All crew in the room during this enemy's hacking pulse will be stunned.

shipIcon.name: icon_sluggel
shipIcon.tooltip: SLUG REPAIR GEL: Breaches on this enemy will automatically be repaired even in the absence of crew. Also provides a 35% crew combat resistance and a 50% hazard resistance to crew in empty rooms.

shipIcon.name: icon_cloakfire
shipIcon.tooltip: SHADOW WEAPONRY: This enemy can fire while cloaked without a penalty to its duration.

shipIcon.name: icon_crystal_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: CRYSTALLINE ARMOR: Dealing hull damage to this enemy with your weapons has a 33% chance to break off a 1 damage shard projectile that flies towards your ship. This shard does not pierce shields.

shipIcon.name: icon_rock_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: ROCK PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 17% chance to resist hull damage from your weapons.

shipIcon.name: icon_regen_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: REGENERATIVE PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy grants it a 10% chance to resist hull damage, and will automatically repair breaches even in the absence of crew.

shipIcon.name: icon_salt_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: SODIUM PLATING: The unique armor on this enemy makes it resilient to ion damage. Additionally, it has a very minor chance of resisting system damage.

shipIcon.name: icon_paladin_armor
shipIcon.tooltip: DIVINE ARMOR: Extremely strong armor reinforced with Aether harvested from precursor ruins, fused with the already resistant armor of the Rockmen. Impacts that deal 1 damage have a 40% chance to be negated, and all other damage is reduced by 1.

achievement.description: Save Ruwen from the Paladins and accept his quest.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_DIANESH
Making Amends
achievement.description: Convince Dianesh that the outside world isn't as bad as she thinks.
achievement.secretDescription: Convince the Crystal monarch to trust the outside world.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_NIGHTS
Drunken Despot
achievement.description: Overthrow Nights then convince him to join your crew.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_SLOCKNOG
The Old King
achievement.description: After defeating Nights, convince Slocknog to join your crew.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_BILLY
Tax Evader
achievement.description: Rescue Billy Hektar from Vael's Angels.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_IRWIN
Washed Up
achievement.description: Rescue Irwin from Vael's Angels.
achievement.secretDescription: Find the former chairman of the EHG.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_EATER
The Millenial Monarch
achievement.description: Convince the Beacon Eater to give you a chance and join your crew.
achievement.secretDescription: Feed the Beacon Eater, whatever that means.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_ANOINTED
God Queen
achievement.description: Convince the Anointed to join your crew.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_DESSIUS
The 16th Reaper
achievement.description: Save the Dynasty Capitol from CICA and convince Dessius to assist you.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_MAYEB
Flower Power
achievement.description: Help Mayeb convince the Praetors.
achievement.secretDescription: Travel to Rt'lak Et and resolve a dispute.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_IVAR
Petal to the Metal
achievement.description: Save Ivar from Ayr's coup.
achievement.secretDescription: Rescue a leader from an undergoing plot.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_TYEREL
Leaf a Good Impression
achievement.description: Save Ty E'Rel from the Coalition.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_ALKALI
Only a Little Racist
achievement.description: Save Alkali from the Legionnaires.
achievement.secretDescription: Rescue an important Shell professor from his own hubris.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_OOJ
Poo Roo!
achievement.description: Recruit OOJ MAJOO.
achievement.secretDescription: Track down and rescue a lab abomination.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_ALKRAM
Viva La Revolution
achievement.description: Help Alkram overthrow Tyrdeo.
achievement.secretDescription: Assist an old general from the Federation-Mantis war in overthrowing a tyrant.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_TONY
Larger than Life
achievement.description: Save Tony Sr. from Vael's Angels and spare his life.
achievement.secretDescription: Rescue a corporate CEO from himself.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_TYRDEO
Just a Gardener
achievement.description: Save Tyrdeo from Alkram's revolution.
achievement.secretDescription: Save a ruler from a bloody revolution.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_SPIDER
Giant Ally Spiders
achievement.description: Save the G.A.S. Queen from Montgomery.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_GUNTPUT
The Shaman
achievement.description: Prove to Guntput that he can trust you.
achievement.secretDescription: Save a primitive species.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_METYUNT
Second Chances
achievement.description: Save Metyunt from a lizard uprising.
achievement.secretDescription: Give a traitor a second chance.

achievement.name: ACH_CREW_OBYN
The Brink of Extinction
achievement.description: Request Obyn to join your crew after rescuing him from the EHG.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_HUMAN

achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of Humanity from Thest.
achievement.description: Show an elite Human crew to Thest. While in effect; Human crew gain a 20% resistance to hazards.

achievement.description: Show a super elite Human crew to Thest. While in effect; Human crew gain a 20% resistance to hazards and a 10% boost to damage, repair, health, and movement speed.

achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of Hardlight from Thest.

Greater Boon of Insectoids
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Greater Boon of Insectoids from Thest.
achievement.description: Show a super elite Mantis crew to Thest. While in effect; Mantis crew gain 25% extra damage.

achievement.description: Show an elite Rock crew to Thest. While in effect; Rock crew put out fires 30% faster.

achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Greater Boon of Silicon from Thest.
achievement.description: Show a super elite Rock crew to Thest. While in effect; Rock crew put out fires 30% faster and move 25% faster.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_CRYSTAL

achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of Geodes from Thest.
achievement.description: Show an elite Crystal crew to Thest. While in effect; Crystal crew do 20% more damage.

Boon of Shells
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of Shells from Thest.
achievement.description: Show an elite Shell crew to Thest. While in effect; Shell crew gain 15% more resistance to combat damage.

achievement.description: Show an elite Leech crew to Thest. While in effect; Leech crew gain 10 more health.

Boon of Mechanics
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.

Boon of Equinoids
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.
achievement.description: Show an Equinoid crew to Thest. While in effect; Start the next run with a tamed equinoid.

Boon of Shapeshifting
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.
achievement.description: Show a Morph crew to Thest. While in effect; Morph crew gain 10% more health and 30% more movement speed.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_LIZARD
Boon of Scales
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.
achievement.description: Show a Lizard crew to Thest. While in effect; Lizard crew gain a 15% boost to all standard stats.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_OSMIAN
Boon of Osmia
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.
achievement.description: Show an Osmian to Thest. While in effect; Osmian crew regain all ability charges and heal holograms in the same room at 2hp/s.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_OBELISK
Boon of Ancients
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.
achievement.description: Show an Obelisk or Cognitive crew to Thest. While in effect; Obelisk and Cognitive crew gain 20 more health and a 15% boost to damage and repair speed.

Boon of Children
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.
achievement.description: Show the Orchid Children to Thest. While in effect; Your crew gain a 1% boost to their health, and you feel immense shame.

Boon of Chaos
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Boon of ??? from Thest.
achievement.description: Visit the Judges with Chaos Mode active. While in effect; Your fuel, missiles, and drone parts will rapidly fluctuate constantly.

Grant of Piloting
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Piloting from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Piloting Subsystem to Corby. While in effect; Your crew is immune to mind control in the Piloting room.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_WEAPONS
Grant of Weaponry
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Weaponry from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Weapons System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew repair the Weapons system 50% faster.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_SHIELDS
Grant of Shielding
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Shielding from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Shields System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew repair the Shields system 50% faster.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_ENGINES
Grant of Engines
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Engines from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Engines System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew repair the Engines system 75% faster.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_MEDBAY
Grant of Healing
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Healing from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Medbay System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew heal 75% faster anywhere.

Grant of Cloning
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Cloning from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Clone Bay System to Corby. While in effect; No skills are lost from cloning.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_OXYGEN
Grant of Life Support
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Life Support from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Oxygen System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew gain 33% resistance to suffocation.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_DRONES
Grant of Drones
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Drones from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Drone Control System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew repair the Drone Control system 75% faster.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_TELEPORTER
Grant of Teleporting
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Teleporting from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Teleporter System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew heal at 1hp/s while in the Teleporter room.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_STEALTH
Grant of Stealth
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Stealth from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Cloaking System to Corby. While in effect; Your hull and systems have a 10% chance to resist damage from enemy weapons.

Grant of Hacking
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Hacking from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Hacking System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew unhack adjacent doors on your own ship.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_MIND
Grant of Manipulation
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Manipulation from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Mind Control System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew are stunned for only 40% of the normal duration on your own ship.

achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Sensors Subsystem to Corby. While in effect; Sensors gain 2 free upgrades. If your ship does not start with Sensors, you will receive lvl2 Sensors for free.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_DOORS
Grant of Doors
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Doors from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Door Control Subsystem to Corby. While in effect; Your Door Control room will gain 50% sabotage resistance, and your crew gain 30% damage resistance while in the Door Control room.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_BATTERY
Grant of Battery
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Battery from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Battery Subsystem to Corby. While in effect; When battery is disabled, your crew gain 33% repair and movement speed.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_REACTOR
Grant of Power
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of Power from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded reactor to Corby. While in effect; You gain 1 free reactor upgrade instantly.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_TEMPORAL
Grant of Time
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Grant of ??? from Corby.
achievement.description: Show a fully upgraded Temporal System to Corby. While in effect; Your crew gain doubled movement speed.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_START

achievement.description: Show a starter weapon to Wakeson. While in effect; Immediately gain 15 scrap and 3 of each resource.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_KERNELS
Blessing of Growth

achievement.description: Show an Elite Kernel or Elite Spore Launcher to Wakeson. While in effect; Immediately gain 6 missiles.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_CRYSELITE
Blessing of Crystals
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Crystals from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show an Elite Crystal Launcher to Wakeson. While in effect; Your hull has a 15% chance to break off a crystal shard when taking damage.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_MINELAUNCHER
Blessing of Traps
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Traps from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show a Mine Launcher to Wakeson. While in effect; Immediate 2 fleet delay.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_SPECIAL
Blessing of Speciality
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Speciality from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any special event weapon or drone to Wakeson. While in effect; Your weapons charge 5% faster.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_TRANSPORT
Blessing of Transports
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Transports from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any transport loot to Wakeson. While in effect; Enemy FTL Drives charge at half speed.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_MATH
Blessing of Mathematics
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Mathematics from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any math loot to Wakeson. While in effect; For each crew member in a room, they will gain a 4% boost to their health and repair speed.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_RENEGADES
Blessing of Renegades
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Renegades from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any Renegade loot to Wakeson. While in effect; You can avoid any hostile Renegade encounter, including bosses, for free.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_SENTRY
Blessing of Sentries
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Sentries from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any Sentry Deployment Cannon to Wakeson. While in effect; Allied crew and crew drones gain 30% damage and movement speed on the enemy ship.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_CURA
Blessing of Tasks
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Tasks from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any C.U.R.A. task reward to Wakeson. While in effect; C.U.R.A. will not charge the usual 30 scrap fee to accept tasks.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_MODULAR
Blessing of Modularity
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of Modularity from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any modular weapon to Wakeson. While in effect; Start with a free Hektar module of a random kind.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_GATLING
Blessing of Super Weapons
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of ??? from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show the original Gatling Gun to Wakeson. While in effect; Your weapons charge 10% faster.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_CLONECANNON
Blessing of Morality
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of ??? from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show the Clone Cannon to Wakeson. While in effect; Your general notoriety starts at negative 3.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_NEXUS
Blessing of Merchants
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of ??? from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show the Rift Waker or any Nexus loot to Wakeson. While in effect; When trading with Sylvan, you will be given a choice between 4 random trade sets.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_NEWGEN
Blessing of Generations
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of ??? from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any New Gen weapon or drone to Wakeson. While in effect; All new crew for the rest of the run will start with at least level 1 in all skills.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_AETHER
Blessing of Aether
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of ??? from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show any Aether weapon or drone to Wakeson. While in effect; Precursor ruins will now globally display on the map whenever present.

achievement.name: ACH_BOON_MADNESS
Blessing of Poets
achievement.secretDescription: Receive the Blessing of ??? from Wakeson.
achievement.description: Show the 'Seuss' Beam to Wakeson. While in effect; Inflicts madness on enemy boarders.

achievement.name: ACH_LEAH_KILL10
Flyswatter
achievement.description: Defeat Leah 10 times.

achievement.name: ACH_LEAH_KILL50
Pesticide
achievement.description: Defeat Leah 50 times.

achievement.name: ACH_LEAH_DEATH
Beyatch!
achievement.description: Die to Leah.

achievement.name: ACH_LEAH_TRUEEND
The Last Beyatch
achievement.description: Kill Leah for real.

achievement.name: ACH_LEAH_JERRY
Bestie!
achievement.description: Bring Jerry to Leah in the Jerome Protectorate.
achievement.secretDescription: Reunite Leah with her bestie.

achievement.name: ACH_LEAH_MASTER
Who's the Beam Master now?
achievement.description: Show Leah the ultimate Beam.
achievement.secretDescription: Show Leah the ultimate Beam.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_KILL
Traveling No More
achievement.description: Destroy Sylvan.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_CREWKILL
Not So Easy
achievement.description: Kill Sylvan's Crew.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_RUN
There's No Next Time
achievement.description: Try to run from Sylvan after fighting him for the second time in a run.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_STORY
Tales of the Merchant
achievement.description: Listen to one of Sylvan's stories and accept the related quest.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_LOVER
In Death do they Part
achievement.description: Reunite Obyn and Sylvan in the merchant's final moments.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_BROTHER
A Tale of Two Brothers
achievement.description: Reunite Billy and Sylvan in the merchant's final moments.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_SELF
Don't be a Ssstranger
achievement.description: Meet Sylvan as Sylvan.

achievement.name: ACH_JERRY_RODEO
Giddy Up
achievement.description: Send Jerry to compete in the EHG's rodeo.
achievement.secretDescription: Send a very eager crewmate to the EHG's rodeo.

achievement.name: ACH_JERRY_CRYSTALPONY
Twilight Sparkle
achievement.description: Find the Crystal Equinoid.

achievement.name: ACH_JERRY_STEED
Loyal Steed
achievement.description: Mount Jerry on an Equinoid.

achievement.name: ACH_JERRY_CRYSTALSTEED
Grief Knows No Limits
achievement.description: Mount Jerry on the Crystal Equinoid.

achievement.name: ACH_JERRY_END
Duel of the Fates
achievement.description: Reunite Jerry and Vance Prime face to face in the True Ending.

achievement.name: ACH_OBEL_AETHERTECH
Forgotten Tech
achievement.description: Install any Aether Tech internal upgrade.

achievement.name: ACH_OBEL_STEALGREATEYE
Grand Theft Oculus
achievement.description: Fix and steal the Great Eye with your Obelisk crew member.
achievement.secretDescription: Make away with the sacred monolith.

achievement.name: ACH_OBEL_BLUEGIANT
You Are My Sunshine
achievement.description: Gain the ability to summon a blue giant star with the Reality Manipulator.

achievement.name: ACH_OBEL_GRAVASTAR
Black Hole Sun
achievement.description: Gain the ability to summon the Gravastar with the Reality Manipulator.

achievement.name: ACH_OBEL_GHOSTMACHINE
Ghost In the Machine
achievement.description: Duplicate a Ghost with the Quantum Item Replicator.
achievement.secretDescription: Abuse dubious quantum mechanics.

achievement.name: ACH_OBEL_IDIOTRESIST
Stubborn to the End
achievement.description: Ignore your warning and try to break free from the Obelisk's control.
achievement.secretDescription: Ignore your warning and face the consequences.

achievement.name: ACH_OBEL_RUINS
Ancient Runes
achievement.description: Translate the text on ancient ruins.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_AENWITHE
Ancients Awakened
achievement.description: Awake Aenwithe from his comatose state.
achievement.secretDescription: Activate an ancient machine.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_AUGMENTED
Legacy of the Forefathers
achievement.description: Discover the Ancient Recovery Site and meet the Augmented.
achievement.secretDescription: Discover the home of the second Lanius Swarm.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_DREADONE
On the Rise
achievement.description: Destroy the first Obelisk Dreadnaught.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_DREADTWO
Divine Retribution
achievement.description: Destroy the second Obelisk Dreadnaught.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_MFKFS
Having Tea at the End of Time
achievement.description: Defeat Vance Prime.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_WENTWORTHLESS
Wentworthless
achievement.description: Insult Vance with Captain Nights.
achievement.secretDescription: He had it coming.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_TULLY
Fateful Reunion
achievement.description: Reunite Tully and Vance Prime before the final showdown.
achievement.secretDescription: Reunite two old friends at the climax of your journey.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_DESTRUCTION
The End?
achievement.description: Destroy the Paragon.

achievement.name: ACH_TRUEEND_DETONATION
The End.
achievement.description: Detonate the Paragon.

achievement.name: ACH_GNOME_COMPLETE
Postponement

achievement.secretDescription: Postpone doomsday by completing the challenge.

achievement.name: ACH_GNOME_FAIL
Failed the Challenge
achievement.description: Ignore The One Who Rhymes's challenge and fight the Flagship anyways.
achievement.secretDescription: Fail the challenge at the Flagship.

achievement.name: ACH_GNOME_TRUEFAIL
Super Failed the Challenge
achievement.description: Ignore The One Who Rhymes's challenge and fight the MFK Flagship anyways.
achievement.secretDescription: Fail the challenge while uncovering the secrets of an ancient race.

achievement.name: ACH_GNOME_NEXUSFAIL
Won the Challenge
achievement.description: Bring the last piece of Her to Prime and enact Her final plan.
achievement.secretDescription: Fail the challenge while discovering the hidden secret in the center of the Multiverse.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_CONTINUITY
Slugs in Black
achievement.description: Defeat G-Van in the Nexus.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_BEANS
A Can of Beans
achievement.description: Convince Sylvan Prime to restore Sylvrick back to his Slug form.
achievement.secretDescription: Funniest shit I've ever seen.

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_PAPYRUS
Bonetrousled
achievement.description: Complete all of Papobyn's puzzles.
achievement.secretDescription: Nyeheheh!

achievement.name: ACH_SYLVAN_BUCKET
The Bucket
achievement.description: As the Renegade contemplated this interesting and remarkable achievement, it dawned on them that this was, in fact, just a reference! Oh, what a clever and delightful reference it was. Why, the Renegade couldn't help but laugh at this cleverly placed reference. The Renegade thought it was hilarious. And hilarious it was. A very good achievement indeed.
achievement.secretDescription: It's reassuring.
